name: is-js
description: A small library for identifying Javascript types.

scripts.docs: typedoc --theme markdown --disableSources --readme none --hideBreadcrumbs --categorizeByGroup false --sort alphabetical --out docs src/index.ts && sed -i '' '/^## Usage/,$d' README.md && echo '## Usage' >> README.md && tail -n +4 docs/README.md | sed '/## Functions/,+1d' >> README.md

author: Scott Rabin <scottrabin@gmail.com> (http://scottrabin.com)
